text: A na mɨgɨa ghaze, kɨ navim aseghɨva otarim bategham. Egh wainba ko dɨpar onganibar aman koghɨva uaghan, dagher God daman gumazamizibar anogoroghezibar aman kogham. Bizir kaba, gumazamizibagh amima me nan damazimɨn mɨze. Eghtɨ gan otarir nan navimɨn aven ikiamin kam, God ua baghvɨra a ginabagham, eghtɨ a kamaghɨra ikɨ mangɨ aremegham.”
